titles.title: Child Welfare Data Modernization Act
To provide for a temporarily enhanced Federal match for certain State or tribal child welfare data reporting expenditures.
Child Welfare Data Modernization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Child Welfare Data Modernization Act
This bill temporarily increases the federal match from 50% to 75% for certain state and tribal expenditures related to child welfare data reporting.
